'Hmm? Where's Kagura?'%K%P
Kagura had seemingly vanished from the room.%K%P
I left the room to go look for her.%K%P
'What are you doing over there?'%K%P
She was sitting in the corner,\ntrying to hide among the kimono.%K%P
'Oh, Yamato? What are you doing here?'%K%P
'Just thought we could talk.'%K%P
'Why don't you talk with Shuri?'%K%P
She tried to hide away all sulky.%K%P
'What's the matter? That's not like you.'%K%P
Shuri was never one for pressure, \nand wasn't easy to approach.%K%P
But Kagura was never one to let it bother her. \nAt least, that's what I had always thought.%K%P
'I guess even you can get nervous, huh?'%K%P
'No... It's not that.'%K%P
'Ahahaha.'%K%P
Forget nervousness, she was laughing.%K%P
'Shuri wouldn't be able to handle me laughing\nlike this, right? That's why I was hiding out here,\nlaughing alone.'%K%P
'Wait, but why?'%K%P
'Come on, it's funny, isn't it?\nA goddess like me might become the next member\nof Lâ˜†SEVEN.'%K%P
'It's a miracle. \nI never even dreamed of this.'%K%P
She kept puffing out her cheeks more and more.%K%P
I decided to reach out and tug at them.%K%P
'Bahaha, ow! I guess I'm not dreaming.'%K%P
'Yeah right, as if this is a dream. \nYou two worked really hard for this.'%K%P
'I've always worked hard, you know.'%K%P
'But my hard work never got me anywhere. \nNo matter how hard I worked to make everyone smile,\nit only ever reached those immediately around me.'%K%P
'That's why this whole thing really is like a dream.'%K%P
'I know I really shouldn't get ahead of myself\nbefore the results are in, but I'm just so happy.'%K%P
'Just thinking that I've reached out to so many\npeople. And all of them watch me, smiles on their\nfaces. I can just feel their love pouring through.'%K%P
'I've never felt so much Sakimitama as this\nsince I manifested as a Wakemitama.'%K%P
I couldn't sense Jinriki like they could.%K%P
But even I could tell that the smiling Kagura\nin front of me was just overflowing with some\nsort of power.%K%P
'You know, this whole audition thing,\nI never really cared all that much about it. \nI just thought I'd try and make everyone happy.'%K%P
'But once we got into it, I really started to\nenjoy it. That's why I latched right on to the\nwhole talk of forming a duo.'%K%P
Kagura was always down for anything fun.%K%P
Even this whole audition, to her,\nwas just some more fun to be had.%K%P
At least, until she met Shuri, that is.%K%P
'It's been so much fun, working with Shuri\nthis whole time.'%K%P
'I had always just focused on making people smile,\nbut she showed me that there was something more.'%K%P
'Everything has just been more fun with her. \nAnd with her I've made even MORE people happy.'%K%P
'Everyday feels like a festival,\nI wish it could last forever!'%K%P
Once the preliminaries were over,\ntheir duo would be over, too.%K%P
In the finals, friends would become foes.%K%P
But to Kagura, it didn't seem to matter.%K%P
She always just full of energy and powered through\nthings her own way. It was what made her special.%K%P
'Heh, well I'm glad to hear it.\nThat's more like the Kagura I know.'%K%P
'Right?'%K%P
'Anyway, that's good and all, but... \nDo you think you could include me, next time?'%K%P
'Oh yeah, whoops!'%K%P
'Don't forget me!'%K%P
'Don't worry, you're part of the group, too. \nThe three of us need to do this together!'%K%P
'Yeah!'%K%P
It felt like I kind of forced my way in,\nbut whatever.%K%P
I just wanted to be there with them,\nand see everyone be happy.%K%P
I was sure she would make it through\nthe preliminaries.%K%P
Our eyes were already set on the next stage.%K%P
